install.name: gamevision
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description:
GameVision - Shape 5 October 2007 Club Template
Click here to visit Shape5.com

param.label: Make sure to hover your mouse over each title in this column for a full description of what each field does.

param.name: xml_menuname
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: What menu would you like to use for the default default menu?

param.label: Because this template gives you the option to use your own background the color combinations are unlimited. The next 8 questions will ask you how you want to color different sections of the template's fonts.

param.name: xml_s5_color
param.label: Main Highlight Color
param.description: What color would you like as a main highlight color (this color will effect most of the template)

param.name: xml_s5_header_color
param.label: Header Position Color
param.description: What color would you like for the header position?

param.name: xml_s5_user1_color
param.label: User 1 Position Color
param.description: What color would you like for the user1 position?

param.name: xml_s5_user2_color
param.label: User 2 Position Color
param.description: What color would you like for the user2 position?

param.name: xml_s5_panel_color
param.label: Advert1 and 2 Color
param.description: What color woud you like for advert1 and advert2?

param.name: xml_s5_body_color
param.label: Main Body Color
param.description: What color woud you like for the main body text?

param.name: xml_s5_top_menu_color
param.label: Top Positoin Color
param.description: What color would you like for the menu in the top position?

param.name: xml_s5_path_color
param.label: Breadcrumbs Color
param.description: What color would you like for the pathway?

param.name: xml_s5_body_opacity
param.label: Body Opacity
param.description: What opacity would you like for the main body? Enter 1 through 7. 1 is completely transparent, 5 is solid black, 6 solid grey, 7 solid white.

param.name: xml_s5_box_link
param.label: S5 Box Label
param.description: If you publish any module to the toolbar position the S5 Box button will appear; what text would you like it to say?

param.name: xml_s5_column_width
param.label: Column Width
param.description: What width in px's would you like the column to be?

param.name: xml_s5_layout
param.label: Page Layout
param.description: What layout would you like, choose 1 or 2.

param.name: xml_s5_loader
param.label: Enbable Page Loader?
param.description: Would you like to enable the page loader screen? Enter yes or no.

param.name: xml_s5_loading_text
param.label: Page Loading Text
param.description: If the page loader is enabled what text would you like it to say?

param.name: xml_s5_logo_height
param.label: Logo Height
param.description: Due to png issues with IE6 you must enter the height of your logo. If you use the logo psd found in the download section and do not change any sizes you do not need to edit the default setting of 72. (The width is automatically calculated.)

param.name: xml_s5_show_menu
param.label: Show Main Menu?
param.description: Would you like the main drop-down, suckerfish menu shown? Enter yes or no.

param.name: xml_s5_open_text
param.label: Open Text
param.description: If you publish any module to advert1 or advert2 a drop down will appear. What text would you like to display if it is closed?

param.name: xml_s5_closed_text
param.label: Close Text
param.description: What text would you like to display if it is opened?

param.name: xml_s5_open_start
param.label: Open Drop Down on Page Load?
param.description: If you publish an items to advert1 or advert2 would you like the drop down to be open or closed on page load? After the first load the position will be saved by a cookie on the user's computer. Ente open or closed.
